climatePledgeFriendly.details: Carbon Neutral Certified by SCS Global Services means the product’s carbon emissions have been measured and reduced, with any remaining emissions offset.

features: Remastered for Mac: MX Master 3S for Mac performance mouse is optimized for macOS, and compatible with iPadOS (1)
Feel the performance: MX Master 3S for Mac Bluetooth mouse features an 8K DPI track-on-glass sensor(2) and Quiet Clicks - offering 90% less click noise (3)
Magspeed scrolling: A computer mouse with remarkable speed, precision, and near silence - MagSpeed scrolling is 90% faster (4), 87% more precise (5), and ultra quiet
Ergonomic design: Work comfortably with a precision mouse featuring a silhouette crafted for a more natural wrist posture and optimally placed thumb controls
App-specific customizations: Speed up and customize your workflow with predefined macOS and app-specific profiles in the improved Logi Options+(6)
Multi Mac Workflow: Pair this cordless mouse with up to 3 Mac computers or laptops and effortlessly transfer text, images, and files between them (6)
USB-C to USB-C rechargeable: Stay powered for up to 70 days on a full charge and get 3 hours of use from this wireless mouse with just a 1-minute quick charge (7)

Plastic parts in MX Master 3S for Mac include certified post consumer recycled plastic (Space Gray: 27%, Pale Gray: 22%(Excludes plastic in printed wiring assembly (PWA), wire, FFC cable, and packaging.). Certified carbon neutral.
body.description: Logitech MX Master 3S For Mac Performance Wireless Mouse Introducing Logitech MX Master 3S for Mac – an iconic mouse remastered for Mac. Now with Quiet Clicks(3) and 8K DPI any-surface tracking for more feel and performance in your Mac computer set-up. Get creative with a complimentary 1-month Creative Cloud subscription with your purchase of MX Master 3S for Mac, and create, make, and do like never before. Product details: Dimensions: 2 x 3.3 x 4.9 in (51 x 84.3 x 124.9 mm) Weight: 4.97 oz (141 g) Compatible with macOS and iPadOS(1) operating systems Compatible with Logi Bolt USB Receiver only (not included) Rechargeable Li-Po (500 mAh) battery Buttons: 7 buttons (Left/Right-click, Back/Forward, App-Switch, Wheel mode-shift, Middle click) Wireless operating distance: 33 ft (10 m) (8) Footnotes: (1) Device basic functions will be supported without software for operating systems other than Windows and macOS (2) 4 mm minimum glass thickness (3) Compared to MX Master 3 for Mac, MX Master 3S for Mac has 90% less Sound Power Level left and right click, measured at 1m (4) Compared to regular Logitech mouse without an electromagnetic scroll wheel (5) Compared to Logitech Master 2S mouse with Logitech Options installed and Smooth scrolling enabled (6) Requires Logi Options+ software, available for Windows and macOS (7) Battery life may vary based on user and computing conditions (8) Wireless range may vary depending on operating environment and computer setup

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: FEEL THE PERFORMANCE. OPTIMIZED FOR MAC Works with macOS and iPadOS – now with 8K DPI track-on-glass sensor and Quiet Clicks.
MAGSPEED SCROLLING Ultimate speed and precision. Scroll 1,000 lines per second and stop on a pixel.

QUIET CLICKS – 90% LESS NOISE Quiet Clicks deliver the satisfying feel you love with 90% less click noise (compared to MX Master 3 for Mac). SCULPTED FOR YOUR HAND Work comfortably with an ergonomic silhouette crafted to support your palm and fingers. MULTIPLE COMPUTERS, ONE FLOW Easily connect and switch between up to 3 Mac devices with Bluetooth Low Energy, and effortlessly transfer text, images, and files between them. QUICK CHARGING , LONG LASTING USB-C quick charge in 1 min for 3 hrs of use – full charge lasts up to 70 days. Battery life may vary based on user and computing conditions.

MX + CREATIVE CLOUD Get a complimentary 1-month Adobe Creative Cloud subscription with your purchase of MX Master 3S for Mac. COUNTLESS CUSTOMIZATIONS Customize buttons and optimize workflows with app-specific profiles in Logi Options+. Requires Logi Options+ software, available for Windows and macOS.

PAIR WITH MX MECHANICAL MINI FOR MAC Enjoy next-level typing with low-profile Tactile Quiet mechanical keys and smart backlighting. LEARN MORE ADD MX KEYS MINI FOR MAC Create with a minimalist keyboard with perfect stroke keys and smart backlighting. LEARN MORE GET PREMIUM AUDIO WITH ZONE WIRELESS Get premium audio for your music and calls, reliable Wireless connectivity, and a background-noise cancelling mic. LEARN MORE SPOTLIGHT PRESENTATION REMOTE Present like never before with intuitive slide navigation, advanced digital pointer modes, and smart time management. LEARN MORE

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Logitech MX Master 3S: A Video Editor's Dream Mouse
reviews.reviewText: As a video editor who's constantly toggling between my 16" M1 MacBook Pro, iPad Pro, and occasionally other devices, I've found a trusty sidekick in the Logitech MX Master 3S for Mac. This mouse isn't just a tool; it's my editing and productivity wand.The ease of switching between devices is akin to magic. Just like its cousin, the MX Keys keyboard, the transition is seamless. I can be trimming a clip on my MacBook and then switch to my iPad for some quick graphic work with just a click. It's like having multiple assistants at my beck and call.Now, let's talk about the programmability - a video editor's dream. The Logi app transforms this mouse into a Swiss Army knife of shortcuts and functions. Every button, scroll wheel, and gesture can be customized to my workflow. It's like having a bespoke suit; everything is tailored exactly to my needs, making editing a breeze and saving me precious time.Need to make custom program-specific hotkeys? Consider it done!The ergonomics are top-notch, too. After hours of editing, my wrist and hand still feel as fresh as a daisy. The mouse fits my hand like it was custom-made for it, and the strategically placed thumb controls are a godsend.And the battery life? I get a solid 2-3 weeks of all-day use on a single charge. It's like the Energizer Bunny of mice - it just keeps going and going. Plus, with USB-C charging, I'm back in action quickly when it does need a boost.Some people have mentioned connectivity hiccups, but I've never experienced one.In short, the Logitech MX Master 3S for Mac is a powerhouse mouse that's transformed my editing workflow. It's comfortable, customizable, and keeps up with my demanding schedule. If you're a video editor or a multi-device power user, this mouse is a no-brainer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 16, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Mac mouse that is great for work and playing a Third-Person Shooting game
reviews.reviewText: I have been using this Mac version of the Logitec mouse for about eight days. I rate this mouse 10/10 because it works as it is supposed to and is very comfortable to hold on to for a long time for both work and game. I want a Mac mouse that:1. is Comfortable/Ergonomic;2. can use the forward and backward buttons for moving PowerPoint slides forward and backward during slide show presentations for work;3. has a dedicated horizontal scroll button;4. can play a Mac game Code of War 2-Striker Zone, a third-person shooting game;5. does not need any USB dongle.This mouse satisfies all my five requirements.1. My right hand is not as big as many adult men's hands, but my right hand is comfortably resting on this mouse (see the attached picture). The rubber on the mouse gives the texture that makes the mouse even more comfortable to hold on to for a long time. To me, if the mouse is ergonomic, it should be comfortable. So I assume these two terms are equivalent.2. My old mouse cannot use the forward and backward buttons to move the PowerPoint slides forward and backward. I install Logitech Option+ software. I can customize all buttons on the mouse for almost every software I use on my MacBook. I am very happy with this because I can now use the forward and backward buttons during my PowerPoint presentations.3. My old mouse does not have a horizontal scroll button. The horizontal scroll button in this mouse is extremely helpful for me, especially for scrolling my spreadsheet. I love this feature.4. There are not many cool games in the Mac environment, but I like to play this third-person shooting game Code of War 2: Striker Zone. With the Logitech Option+ software, I can adjust the pointer speed that fits my needs for this game. Perhaps I am not a professional gamer like other reviewers, I do not notice any lag even though I only use the Bluetooth connection.5. The fact that this Mac version mouse does not come with a USB dongle is something that I look for. My MacBook does not have any USB A ports. My old mouse comes with a USB dongle that I need to use an adaptor to plug into the thunderbolt port on my MacBook every time I use the old mouse. Whenever I take out my MacBook and the old mouse, I will have to look for the dongle+adaptor as well. I love this Mac mouse because I do not need to put anything on the thunderbolt port to use this Mac version of the Logitech mouse. It saves me a lot of hassle when I take out my laptop every day to work.Regarding the negatives other reviewers mentioned, they are not issues for me. For example, a clicking sound is fine. All the previous mice I owned before had the clicking sound, so I used to hear the clicking sound. The clicking sound actually gives me acoustic feedback to confirm that I press the button. As mentioned above, I do not notice any lag when I play my favorite third-person shooting game. But I have not tried playing other more popular FPS games on my MacBook (if available), and I am not a professional gamer for sure. All the buttons and functions work perfectly as they should. I do not notice any skipping or interruption during working and gaming. So far, I have not charged my mouse yet.I am happy with this purchase :-)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and Easy to Use
reviews.reviewText: Admittedly, I was slightly hesitant when buying this. I knew I wanted a new mouse but didn't know how "fancy" I wanted to go. Amazon suggested this mouse paired with a keyboard I was buying and I went for it, full send!This mouse has been nothing short of amazing. it is extremely comfortable and ergonomic. The controls are great and quick to find/get used to. I use a Mac and all of the features work well and are compatible with it. That was a big thing for me too.The battery life has been excellent. At the time of writing, I have not had to charge it yet! The mouse is very responsive to any movements I make.One thing i had to do was buy a mouse pad for it. But I think this is mostly due to the surface I was using it on. After that I had 0 issues!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product. Given how much time you will spend connected to it, it's worth every penny!
reviews.reviewText: So good, I have 3 of them. Does what a mouse should do without getting in the way of you getting stuff done.....You can mess around with the productivity options, but straight out of the box it's just a pleasant user experience. The materials feel nice in the hand and are durable.The ability to connect it to 3 different devices is great. All in all, it's worth the price given how much time you likely will spend using it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Phenomenal mouse, great for teaching/multiple devices, severely reduced hand strain
reviews.reviewText: I was struggling with my magic mouse due to the increase in computer time I was dealing with at my job recently. Hand was cramping up by the end of the day especially by my thumb. The controls are great, you can customize any setting most people could think to worry about. Very easy for me as a special ed teacher to go back and forth from school ipad and macbook seamlessly. Works like a dream without a mouse pad too if you have limited space for a mouse. 10/10 recommend, I honestly prefer this over my apple magic mouse now. Battery is great, have been using it for over a week at work and still have not charged it from opening it out of the box.

reviews.reviewTitle: Lo volvería a comprar.. !! Me encantó Color gris espacial
reviews.reviewText: Excelente producto, materiales premium, lo compré para usarlo con una MacBook Pro M2 MAX y se vínculo sin problemas, incluye:1.- Manual2.- Cable para cargarloEl producto llegó antes de lo previsto y en excelente condiciones sin daños en el embalaje, lo recomiendo 100% y es súper ergonómico.

I needed to get a new mouse that was bluetooth compatable because my new MacBook doesn't have any USB ports. It's got a great function where you can just use the button on the bottom to switch between devices. It's very comfortable on the hand. There's several customizable buttons that can switch functions depending on the app/program you are using at the time. This is one of the better mice I've ever had.

reviews.reviewTitle: Não recebi exatamente o produto que comprei, mas o problema foi resolvido
reviews.reviewText: Não recebi exatamente o produto que comprei. Mas a atendente Dayane merece destaque pois tratou o assunto com a devida importância e buscou minha satisfação com cliente.

reviews.reviewTitle: Muy caro para las prestaciones que tiene
reviews.reviewText: El scroll es suave pero su curvatura no es tan buena, muy caro para sus prestaciones
Works great. Feels great, is great. I wish that it would also work for my pc too.
